mapper.delete:
UPDATE oa_tags SET ddd='1', update_time = #{updateTime}, uu2 = #{uu2} WHERE update_time = #{updateTime}
AND oatags_id = #{oatagsId}

DELETE FROM oa_tags WHERE update_time = #{updateTime}
AND oatags_id = #{oatagsId}
mapper.select:
SELECT FROM oa_tags WHERE 1 = 1
AND oatags_id = #{oatagsId}

SELECT a.oatags_id, a.sid, a.oatags_name, a.type, a.cycle, a.is_use, a.create_time, a.creator, a.update_time, a.updator FROM oa_tags a join oa_rule b on a.oatags_id = b.oatags_id WHERE 1 = 1 AND a.is_use = 1 AND b.oarule_id in
#{item}
